definition: toward/to face/to open onto/to turn towards/orientation/exposure/Qibla (Islam)
abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
towards/to face/to turn towards/direction/to support/to side with/shortly before/formerly/always/all along/(suffix) suitable for .../oriented to ...
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
variant of 向[xiang4]/direction/orientation/to face/to turn toward/to/towards/shortly before/formerly

sentences.english: Believes in working toward a two-state solution between Israel and the Palestinians.
sentences.chinese: 认为应朝向巴以作为两个国家的解决方案的方向努力。

sentences.english: The culture is the real life of people toward self-identification by nature.
sentences.chinese: 文化是永远朝向自我认同而存在的人的现实生活。

sentences.english: At the moment, only the polygons pointed towards the light source will be lit.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的场景里，只有朝向光源的多边形是被照亮的。

sentences.english: The main entrance to the building includes an exhibition gallery facing the central garden courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 建筑的主要入口包含一个展览厅，朝向中央花园庭院。

sentences.english: The atlantes and caryatids also appear to evolve towards the uppermost floors of the towers.
sentences.chinese: 这些男像柱和女像柱都朝向塔楼最高的楼层。

sentences.english: These are the ones that are coming right out at you, so this is going to be on a second pi orbital.
sentences.chinese: 它们朝向你们，所以这里有另一个π键。

sentences.english: Orient the large side of the basket tangentially to the flow stream with the Tablet standing on its edge.
sentences.chinese: 使篮子的大边和边角的片剂一起垂直的朝向水流。

sentences.english: The new structure faces south and looks towards a restored sauna built from cinder block.
sentences.chinese: 新建筑朝向南侧，可以看到从煤渣块改造的蒸汽浴室。

sentences.english: combination of community-sourced content and algorithmically-driven smarts is forging a promising path towards this potential future.
sentences.chinese: 这种结合铸造了朝向潜在未来的光明征程。

sentences.english: The entrance to the office, as well as the principal of the business, should face north or east.
sentences.chinese: 而房间的大门以及办公桌的必须朝向南或东。

sentences.english: The bays have been designed according to their orientation and the level of light required.
sentences.chinese: 凸窗按照各自的朝向和对光线要求的不同程度来设计。

sentences.english: In your turn, you should make sure to move your ankles and knees further and further towards the inside of the turn.
sentences.chinese: 转弯途中，双踝和双膝的动作要越来越朝向内弯。

sentences.english: Place the front wheels in the straight-ahead position.
sentences.chinese: 将方向盘定位，使前车轮朝向正前方。

sentences.english: Ashley and Melanie, on the balcony open to the garden.
sentences.chinese: 希礼和梅兰妮站在朝向花园的阳台上。

sentences.english: Mosques are oriented so that the mihrab faces Mecca.
sentences.chinese: 清真寺会决定朝向使米哈拉布能朝向麦加。

sentences.english: Mosques are oriented so that the mihrab faces Mecca.
sentences.chinese: 清真寺会决定朝向使米哈拉布能朝向麦加。

definition: vertical/to erect/to set upright/vertical stroke in Chinese characters/young servant (old)
to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
